definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

sentences.english: Tires, the engine, the body, and the seats are component of a car.
sentences.chinese: 轮胎，引擎，车身以及坐椅都是一辆汽车的零部件。

sentences.english: Tires- the engine- the body- and the seats are component of a vehicular.
sentences.chinese: 轮胎，引擎，车身以及坐椅都是一辆汽车的零部件。

sentences.english: A chair at the corner is inclining your words.
sentences.chinese: 墙角的一个坐椅，倾斜着你的话语。

sentences.english: Next, this might be a good time to add the seat and windshield.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，把坐椅和挡风玻璃安装上去。

sentences.english: A comfortable seat wide enough for two or three people to sit on.
sentences.chinese: 原来沙发上可供二或三人并排坐的恬静坐椅。

sentences.english: The child seat belt was not properly anchored to the car.
sentences.chinese: 儿童坐椅的安全带并未在车上固定到位。

sentences.english: Tires, the engine, the body, and the seats are components of a car.
sentences.chinese: 轮胎，引擎，车身以及坐椅都是一辆汽车的零部件。

sentences.english: And, child safety sit chair should not be kept in front of the co-pilot position.
sentences.chinese: 并且，儿童安全坐椅不应放在前排副驾驶位置。

sentences.english: For example, take a car seat.
sentences.chinese: 举例来说，坐一个汽车坐椅。

sentences.english: They set out the chairs for the meeting in rows of ten.
sentences.chinese: 他们摆好会议的坐椅，每排十把椅子。

sentences.english: A chair is a movable seat for one person which has a back.
sentences.chinese: 椅子是一种可移动的一人坐椅，有靠背。

sentences.english: By analyzing and classifying these documents, This research can understand the advantages and the defects of the chairs.
sentences.chinese: 经由文献之分类与分析后，了解各类型坐椅之优缺点。

sentences.english: Small children need to be in a special child seat at the back.
sentences.chinese: 小小孩需要坐安置在后座上的特别儿童坐椅。

sentences.english: She leaned back comfortably in her chair with a book open on her lap.
sentences.chinese: 她惬意地仰靠在坐椅上，膝上有一本摊开的书。
